name: Generate Alert for Firewall Configuration Change(Port Forwarding)

resource.name: {{vars.alert_data.incident_data.attributes.eventName}}
resource.severity: {% if (vars.alert_data.incident_data.attributes.eventSeverityCat == "CRITICAL") %}{{("Severity" | picklist("Critical"))["@id"]}}{% elif (vars.alert_data.incident_data.attributes.eventSeverityCat == "HIGH") %}{{("Severity" | picklist("High"))["@id"]}}{% elif (vars.alert_data.incident_data.attributes.eventSeverityCat == "MEDIUM") %}{{("Severity" | picklist("Medium"))["@id"]}}{% elif (vars.alert_data.incident_data.attributes.eventSeverityCat == "LOW") %}{{("Severity" | picklist("Low"))["@id"]}}{% elif (vars.alert_data.incident_data.attributes.eventSeverityCat == "MINIMAL") %}{{("Severity" | picklist("Minimal"))["@id"]}}{% endif %}
